content.description: The Explorer has been given a major visual overhaul and a search function has been added.

tabs.name: Dataflows in the data source dialog

content.description: You can now create dataflows directly from the data source dialog to process the raw data from your data sources even faster.
You can now create try catch building blocks to handle errors.
The new Beckhoff TwinCAT 3 data source enables you to connect TwinCAT PLCs with Peakboard.
